name: Information Exchange Package Documentation
summary: Learn about .IEPD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: In 2023, the NATO Standardization Office defined the Information Exchange Package Documentation (IEPD) file format. This definition was published within the NATO Core Data Framework.

IEPD files are ZIP files used to publish and transfer schemas, examples, catalogs, and other documents related to interoperable information exchange solutions. Often, IEPD files are published under a NATO Standards Agreement cover document and made available in the NATO Standardization Document Database.

instructions: Because IEPD files are renamed .ZIP files, you can open them with any Zip-decompression utility (such as 7-Zip or The Unarchiver). Before doing so, you may have to change the file's extension to .zip.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
